author: DarkWarriorAntaeus

text:
The Solstice theme is the intro theme from the video game Solstice for the NES. They should have it here on Youtube.

From what I understand, the Follin brothers have composed music for a lot of obscure NES games and a lot of Commodore 64 games. They're great composers, nonetheless.
author: ManfredMitchum

text: What's the "Solstice" theme?  What else have they worked on?
author: DarkWarriorAntaeus

text:
Not bad music for this game.
I suppose we need to look past AVGN's review of it to enjoy the music.
Touch the ceiling you die. Touch the side you die. Go too far to the left you die! Too far to the right you die! you die, die, die ,die ,die ,die,die,die,die,die...!

Come to think of it...that's like 80% of all the side scrolling shooter games I played. And alot of them rocked!!
